article:
The interface lets you choose a list of jar files and specify the jar file which will repackage their content.
The interface contains the following elements:
Input jar files: the selector allowing to specify the jar files you want to repackage
Output jar file: the selector allowing to specify the jar file which must be the result of the repackaging
Properties file: allows to specify an XML file which will specify how the jar files content will be added, including the manifest properties
debug: a checkbox allowing to emit messages during the execution
The Apply action will be enabled when the input and output selectors have been set.
